title.rendered: Bridging the gap between grass roots voices and governments

content.rendered:
Tahere Siisiialafia gives a Pacific perspective on advocating for the meaningful engagement of young people in their own education policy. 

As a Samoan member of the Pacific Youth Council, Tahere participated in the 19th Conference of Commonwealth Education Ministers (19CCEM) Civil Society and Youth Forums.
